details.productInformation:
Enjoy cooking and your meal even more with the knowledge that washing up wonâ€™t be an issue, thanks to the Neff S513M60X1GIntegrated Dishwasher. The dishwasher has an A++ Energy Rating, as well as housing loads of technology, so it can care for the environment as well as your crockery.

The Neff S513K60X1Gâ€™s curved, alternating spray arms, large spray head, six programmes and five cleaning temperatures, along with its efficient SilentDrive motor will ensure, no matter your wash requirements, that your glasses and dishes will be washed efficiently and quietly to perfection.

For your convenience, the S513K60X1G has a helpful red InfoLight, which beams onto your floor, letting you know that you the dishwasher is operating.

Easy to use push button controls, as well as an informative digital display panel, are all neatly hidden on top of the door.

Key features:

  • Childproof Door lock
  • Three special options: VarioSpeedPlus, HygienePlus, Extra Dry
  • White interior EmotionLight
  • NeffSparkle - glass care system
  • Three stage, Rackmatic height-adjustable top basket
  • Delay timer (1 â€“ 24 hours)
  • Water fault indicator
  • Acoustic end of cycle indicator
  • Self-cleaning filter system

attributes.name: Wash performance
attributes.toolTip: Graded on performance A - G, with A being the highest grade. The higher the grade the more energy efficient the appliance.

attributes.name: Noise Level
attributes.toolTip: How noisy, in decibels, the machine is. The lower the dB, the quieter the appliance

attributes.name: Time remaining indicator
attributes.toolTip: Tells you how long the programme's got to go

attributes.name: Energy Consumption Per Standard Cycle
attributes.toolTip: Based on the drying cycle of the standard cotton programme at full load. Actual energy consumption per cycle will depend on how the appliance is used.

attributes.name: Adjustable racking
attributes.toolTip: Lets you move the racking around to fit large or awkward items

attributes.name: Delicate Wash
attributes.toolTip: This wash cycle provides a gentle wash for delicate items

attributes.name: Program Sequence Indicator
attributes.toolTip: Tells you the progress of your washing/drying cycle

attributes.name: Estimated Annual Energy Consumption
attributes.toolTip: How much electricity the item would use over a year

attributes.name: Place Settings
attributes.toolTip: A complete set of items provided for one person at a meal

attributes.name: Energy Rating
attributes.toolTip: Graded on performance, from A+++ to G, with A+++ being the highest rating. Higher ratings mean better energy efficiency

attributes.name: Overflow protection
attributes.toolTip: An anti-flood device prevents the machine from being damaged by flooding from the inlet pipe

attributes.name: Automatic Load Adjustment
attributes.toolTip: Automatically adjusts water level for a smaller load, thus saving time and money

attributes.name: Drying performance
attributes.toolTip: Graded on performance A - G, with A being the highest grade

attributes.name: Quick wash
attributes.toolTip: Speedy programme when you need items cleaned quickly

attributes.name: Estimated Annual Water Consumption
attributes.toolTip: The amount of water used in litres per year, based on 220 standard washing cycles for cotton programs at 60Â°C and 40Â°C at full and partial load. Actual water consumption will depend on how the appliance is used.

details.editorsNotes: Much has changed since Carl Neff made his first oven in 1877. People all over the world have rolled up their sleeves and shared in the joys and chores of cooking. Global ingredients have become local ingredients. And from humble beginnings, the kitchen has grown in stature, to become the centrepiece of the home - often with a NEFF oven right at its heart.
